data.eml:eml: A new interstitial species of the genus Caecianiropsis Menzies & Pettit, 1956 (Isopoda, Asellota) from Korea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kim, Jeongho, Lee, Wonchoel, Karanovic, Ivana (2019): A new interstitial species of the genus Caecianiropsis Menzies & Pettit, 1956 (Isopoda, Asellota) from Korea. ZooKeys 832: 35-56, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.832.30241, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.832.30241
